question: Which among the following statements is not correct ?
option1: All money bills  originate in Lok Sabha Only
option2: Resolution of removal of Vice President can originate in Rajya Sabha Only
option3: Resolution to create new all India services can be initiated in Lok Sabha Only
option4: No confidence motion against council of Ministers is exclusive power of Lok Sabha
answer: Resolution to create new all India services can be initiated in Lok Sabha Only
explanation: Resolution to create new all India services can be initiated in Rajya Sabha only and Parliament can enact this only after Rajya Sabha passes this by two third majority.
